title: BSD-style link: L(E,1) nonvanishing predicts vanishing HEO
statement_md: For cubic sequences \(S(n)=n^3 + a n + b\) and elliptic curve \(E: y^2 = x^3 + a x + b\), the nonvanishing of \(L(E,1)\) predicts \(\mathbf{H}_2^{S}(k)=0\) for fixed \(k\).
assumptions_md: Interprets \(S\) as arithmetic data of \(E\); Euler products truncated; empirical HEO over finite prefixes.
